Detailed Description

Collects data on distributed communication graphs and writes out for analysis.

A node can have multiple values, each with a label. An node can have multiple edges, each with a label.

Member Function Documentation

void SAMRAI::tbox::CommGraphWriter::setWriteFullGraph ( bool  write_full_graph  )  [inline]

Set whether to write full graph.

Writing full graph is unscalable, but can be done at large scales if you have enough computing time and memory. Writing full graph is on by default.

const std::string &  edge_label,

int  other_node

Set an edge in the current record.

The label only matters on the root process. Other processes do nothing in this method.
